channel.title: Lawl?
channel.description: What happened to Lawl, he has 0 rep now? And he has no Legend status. Did somebody hack the forums?

Enough shit chat.

It’s a great pity they have lost their positions, personally I disagree with the actions taken.

item.title: Lawl?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:52, topic:199572”]Okay so Pwnd, Casey, Jme and Naill get away with it? Gikid only gets a warning (even though he’s an idiot) and the rest get banned?

This forum sucks tits. Lothy should unban the others and ban himself.[/quote]
Heh I get brought into this.

I rarely spam on these forums(as in 7 months or so without a warning)
Sure, I’ll admit I posted one picture on the panda thread, so did a few others, but we removed them all from the thread, and the majority stopped there apart from these select few.

Trust me, if I spammed or anything I would not be here(Thanks Niall!)

Read full topic

item.title: Lawl?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:78, topic:199572”][quote author=Frell link=topic=264241.msg2188787#msg2188787 date=1208290871]

?? This forum is hardly based around anything now… and I don’t see why that matters. I like it as long as I get lols from it.

go lol with some real friends in real life. Dont spend your time here unless you have a reason.

Go suck on my dick, I have multiple sources of lol! Anywhom I was here before you so you go away :(.

I came here from moparscape to screw around with java a bit more.
[/quote]
I think you just gave yourself a death sentence :P[/quote]
‘from’ moparscape as in, not recently but a long while back. http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php/topic,162314.0.html that was when i stepped away from private servers, almost a year ago.

item.title: Lawl?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:64, topic:199572”][quote author=cooper link=topic=264241.msg2188015#msg2188015 date=1208241930]

Honestly I think 21 days is a little light,so they should be grateful but likely they wont care…I don’t understand why people think they should be unbanned,considering they were being idiots.

I really must agree.

Why? If you banned everyone for being idiots at times, there would be no one left.

That is why most of moparscape and some of mitb is going downhill. People come, yet spend all there time in general discussion.

What do you mean?
[/quote]
The main reason this forum was created was to learn to program, rs hack etc. But now people come here just to post in general discussion. And instead of helping people, they flame the shit out of them until they give up.[/quote]

?? This forum is hardly based around anything now… and I don’t see why that matters. I like it as long as I get lols from it.

Read full topic

item.title: Lawl?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:66, topic:199572”][quote author=cooper link=topic=264241.msg2188041#msg2188041 date=1208242367]

Honestly I think 21 days is a little light,so they should be grateful but likely they wont care…I don’t understand why people think they should be unbanned,considering they were being idiots.

I really must agree.

Why? If you banned everyone for being idiots at times, there would be no one left.

That is why most of moparscape and some of mitb is going downhill. People come, yet spend all there time in general discussion.

What do you mean?

The main reason this forum was created was to learn to program, rs hack etc. But now people come here just to post in general discussion. And instead of helping people, they flame the shit out of them until they give up.

True, but the other sections still do thrive a little. Hopefully they will bounce back more
[/quote]
People like lawl usually made both communities look like shit.[/quote]
But banning him could bring worse people in his place, and he isn’t always that bad and does help sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: Lawl?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:64, topic:199572”][quote author=cooper link=topic=264241.msg2188015#msg2188015 date=1208241930]

Honestly I think 21 days is a little light,so they should be grateful but likely they wont care…I don’t understand why people think they should be unbanned,considering they were being idiots.

I really must agree.

Why? If you banned everyone for being idiots at times, there would be no one left.

That is why most of moparscape and some of mitb is going downhill. People come, yet spend all there time in general discussion.

What do you mean?
[/quote]
The main reason this forum was created was to learn to program, rs hack etc. But now people come here just to post in general discussion. And instead of helping people, they flame the shit out of them until they give up.[/quote]

Which is much more entertaining than writing a script then to have it critiqued by ignorant script kiddies. I don’t only post in the General Discussion Board. But that is where most of my posts have amassed.

We really don’t need to get on the discussion of the Forum itself. That’s a topic we’ve discussed many times before.

Read full topic
